text:
Then I heard a voice from heaven say, “Write this: Blessed are the dead who die in the Lord from now on.”

“Yes,” says the Spirit, “they will rest from their labor, for their deeds will follow them.”

Revelation 14:13

It fell during the day at some point. I drove to work and there was no snow then at some point I looked out of the window and it was all white. Maybe it didn't snow everywhere in Moscow, it's pretty big. Today there was heavy snow everywhere though.
Yesterday was the first time snow fell this year in Moscow.
